attributes.action: Stop insurance companies ripping off young and disabled drivers
attributes.additional_details: I believe that insurance companies need to be rid of the computers and assess each young person and disabled person on a case by case basis.
attributes.background: I am a 17 year old diabetic that has recently received an insurance quote of 10 thousand pound. This is an absolute abomination and I don't understand how they can umbrella every single type 1 diabetic, disabled or young person.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 
You could ask Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for insurance companies to discriminate on the basis of age or disability.
